dcterms:creator: H. Borgli
et al.
dcterms:description: Hyper-Kvasir is a large multi-class public gastrointestinal dataset collected from gastroscopy and colonoscopy procedures, containing 110,079 images from both abnormal and normal patients, with labels produced by experienced radiologists.
dcterms:title: Hyper-Kvasir

dcterms:creator: L. Li
et al.
dcterms:description: LAG is a large-scale fundus image dataset for glaucoma detection, containing 4,854 fundus images with both positive and negative glaucoma scans, reorganized for training UAD methods.
dcterms:title: LAG

dcterms:creator: Y. Liu
et al.
dcterms:description: Liu et al.'s colonoscopy dataset consists of colonoscopy images from 18 videos of 15 patients, with a training set of 13,250 normal images and a testing set containing both abnormal and normal images.
dcterms:title: Liu et al.'s colonoscopy dataset
